Plot: A romantic drama about a soldier who falls for a conservative college student while he's home on leave.
Title: Dear John
Actors: Channing Tatum, Amanda Seyfried, Richard Jenkins, Henry Thomas
tomatoConsensus: Built from many of the same ingredients as other Nicholas Sparks tearjerkers, Dear John suffers from its cliched framework, as well as Lasse Hallstrom's curiously detached directing.
